nodes.text: A male individual was a Stationmaster at Fostar Haven around 0 BBY. He allowed the Rebel Alliance to have a presence there. When the Galactic Empire showed up at Fostar Haven hunting an Alderaanian refugee convoy, he protested and activated the station's defense turrets, firing on Helix Squadron, and prompting a whole scale retaliation against Fostar Haven.
The Stationmaster's voice appeared in the prologue of the 2020 video game Star Wars: Squadrons.
